timeline.title: A chance hello
timeline.text: We met through friends on a crisp fall evening. A short conversation turned into hours of laughter.
timeline.alt: Zach and Caroline smiling in the fall

timeline.title: It's official!
timeline.text: We're an item - to the moon and beyond!

timeline.title: Our first big adventure together
timeline.text: We spent 10 of the most romantic days of our lives together in Hawaii.

timeline.title: The proposal
timeline.text: At the summit of Mt. Galbraith just outside Golden,CO. Happy tears, and a resounding yes!
